ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MARKETA EVANS of Toronto, Ontario, to be special adviser to the Minister of International Trade, to be known as the Extractive Sector Corporate Social Responsibility Counsellor, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective October 19, 2009.
